original_text: And when he came to the steps, he was actually carried by the soldiers because of the violence of the crowd,
korean_text: 바울이 층대에 이를 때에 무리의 폭행으로 말미암아 군사들에게 들려가니

sentences.original_text: And when he came to the steps
he was actually carried by the soldiers
because of the violence of the crowd
